model

Interface ItemsComposite.AddStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MovableStrategy, NonMovableStrategy
    Enclosing class:
    ItemsComposite

    public static interface ItemsComposite.AddStrategy
    This class represents the interface for the move strategies. Each move strategy must implement the required methods.
    Author:
    Harman (singhharm1)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addTo(Player player, ItemsComposite composite, Location location)
      Different add strategies implement different algorithms for adding items to player.
      String getDescription(ItemsComposite composite)
      Returns the description Item

    • Method Detail

      • addTo

        boolean addTo(Player player,
              ItemsComposite composite,
              Location location)
        Different add strategies implement different algorithms for adding items to player. This method determines what items are added to the player depending on the move strategy that the composite object uses.
        Parameters:
        player -

      • getDescription

        String getDescription(ItemsComposite composite)
        Returns the description Item

        Returns:
